body.p: Sir -- several weeks ago -- I started recommendations for officers of my Regiment -- But suppose they never reached you. I have the honor to again recommend 1st Lt Samuel Belden of Company "B" to the be promoted to Captain of same Co 1st Ky Cav vice "Drye" promoted, also 2nd Lt Vincent Peyton to the rank of 1st Lt same company, and orderly Sergt Stephen G Averitt to be made 2nd Lt. same company. The aggregate strength of said Company is Eighty-nine (89) enlisted men.

I have the honor also to recommend to you for promotion 2nd Lt. James. S. Pankey of Company "I" 1st Ky Cav to be promoted to the rank of 1st Lt same Company vice Scott resigned. and orderly sergt Thomas Graves to be made 2nd Lt same Company. The aggregate strength of Co "I" is forty four "44".

I am very Resptly
your obt Servt
S. Adams Lt Col
1st Ky Cavl

1 Cavy
Irvine Ky
April 7th 1864
Adams. S. A
Lt Col. 1s Cavl.

States that several weeks since he sent the following recommendations but has not heard from you. viz 1s Lt Saml Belden to be Cap' Co B vice Brye promt. 2d Lt Vincent Peyton to be 1s Lt Co B' vice Belden prot Sergt Stephen G Aivett to be 2d Lt vice Peyton, &c others

Issue
Boyle
Coms issd & forwd
April 22 1864
see L. B.
Recd A G. O 19" Aprl 1864
